DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , multi-centre study consist 2 part . Part 1 : Clinical Pharmacology Study ( drug-drug interaction AK106-001616 methotrexate ) Part 2 : Proof Concept Study
DOC.brief_title: A Study AK106-001616 Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis RA ( class I III ) Stable dose methotrexate ( least 12 week ) Pregnant breastfeed Abnormal screen laboratory test value consider clinically significant
